mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, imagePath, regdate, title, content FROM board_gallery ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_gallery (num, writer, imagePath, regdate, title, content) VALUES(board_gallery_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{imagePath}, SYSDATE, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, content, imagePath, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM board_gallery ORDER BY num DESC) WHERE num = #{num}
